mapper.select: select count(*) FROM zan where user_id=#{userId} and type=#{type} and type_id=#{typeId} and parent_id=#{parentId} and present_id=#{presentId}
mapper.delete: delete from zan where user_id=#{userId} and type=#{type} and type_id=#{typeId} and parent_id=#{parentId} and present_id=#{presentId}
